name: MO Dungeons
description:
1. Areum Kim - Project Manager, Designer (art)
  2. Daun Kim - Programmer(sound)
  • Multiplayer Role Playing game
  • 5 characters (Knight, Rogue, Healer, Mage, Archer)
  • Clearing “Dungeons (three stages)” (Multi User Dungeon Game)
  • Players can create a lobby room for the dungeon or enter one of the rooms for the dungeons. Dungeons are made up of three stages. Each dungeon has unique patterns of monsters’ skills or boss’ skills. Even though we designed only one “dungeon,” we would create more later.
  • Players also can choose one character to play, but the game doesn’t have choices for now. At first, we wanted to make five characters, but we only made one character.
  • There is an item shop and a weapon shop. Before starting each stage, players can buy some items or weapons with coins.
  • The first stage has 5 monsters, the second stage has 10 monsters, and the third stage has a boss. The monsters spawn on the four positions randomly, and monsters drop some coins.
  • The dungeon could be completed with one player, but the dungeon would be easier with several players.
